articles.title: Add hosts to your monitoring
articles.description: Adding hosts in Checkmk is a fundamental step to monitor and manage your infrastructure effectively. Here you will find articles to guide you through the process of adding hosts to your monitoring.

articles.title: Monitor a server
articles.description: To monitor servers and workstations, Checkmk provides its own agents for several types of systems which you can easily install on your hosts.

articles.title: Monitor AWS
articles.description: Checkmk includes a extensive module for monitoring AWS. This allows you to monitor your AWS infrastructure in a very detailed way.

articles.title: Configuring dashboards and views
articles.description: Creating a custom dashboard in Checkmk enables you to tailor your monitoring interface to specific needs and preferences. Here you will find articles to guide you through the process of configuring dashboards and views.

articles.title: Setup and manage rules
articles.description: Rules in Checkmk allow you to define conditions and actions for various aspects of monitoring. Here's a brief guide on how to create and manage rules in Checkmk.

articles.title: Setup notifications
articles.description: Setting up notifications in Checkmk is crucial for timely awareness of critical events in your IT infrastructure. Notifications ensure that relevant stakeholders are informed when issues occur, allowing for prompt response and resolution.
